name: European Fish Processors & Traders Association
goal:
Represents the EU fish processors and traders vis-Ã -vis the EU institutions.
Contributes to consultations made by EU institutions as regards policy issues affecting fishery and aquaculture products processing and trading.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives:
Regulation 1379/2013 as regards market policy of fishery and aquaculture products
Regulation 1380/2013 on the common fisheries policy
Regulation 1169/2011 on food information to consumers
Regulation 2015/2265 on autonomous tariff quotas
GSP Regulation
Free Trade Agreements
Hygiene Package Regulation
